de.gnwi.jdpd.tests.interactions

Class ParticleIndexPairRandomCalculatorForTesting

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.jdpd.utilities.CellBox
      • de.gnwi.jdpd.samples.interactions.ParticlePairInteractionCalculator
        • de.gnwi.jdpd.tests.interactions.ParticleIndexPairRandomCalculatorForTesting
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICalculator, IParticlePairInteractionCalculator

    public class ParticleIndexPairRandomCalculatorForTesting
extends ParticlePairInteractionCalculator
    Particle index pair calculator that uses ParticlePairInteractionCalculator to determine particle index pairs within a defined cut-off length. NOTE: This calculator is testing purposes only and is NOT used in productive Jdpd.
    Author:
    Achim Zielesny

        aSimulationLogger - Simulation logger
        aBoxSize - Box size
        aPeriodicBoundaries - Periodic boundaries
        aCutOffLength - Cut-off length for partitioning of the box
        aCellNeigbours - Cell neighbours (may be null then cell neighbours are determined)

    • Method Detail

      • calculateParticlePairInteraction

        protected void calculateParticlePairInteraction(int aParticleIndex_i,
                                                int aParticleIndex_j,
                                                double aRij_x,
                                                double aRij_y,
                                                double aRij_z,
                                                double aRij_Square,
                                                RandomAdderGroup aRandomAdderGroup,
                                                Parameters aParameters,
                                                ParticlePairDistanceParameters aParticlePairDistanceParameters)
        Particle pair interaction calculation NOTE: ParticlePairInteractionCalculator parallelisation guarantees that NO thread-safe implementation of random number generator or double adder is necessary. NOTE: No checks are performed.
        Specified by:
        calculateParticlePairInteraction in class ParticlePairInteractionCalculator
        Parameters:
        aParticleIndex_i - Index of particle i
        aParticleIndex_j - Index of particle j
        aRij_x - x[aParticleIndex_i] - x[aParticleIndex_j]
        aRij_y - y[aParticleIndex_i] - y[aParticleIndex_j]
        aRij_z - z[aParticleIndex_i] - z[aParticleIndex_j]
        aRij_Square - Squared distance between particle i and j
        aRandomAdderGroup - Random adder group (NOTE: NOT thread-safe, see above)
        aParameters - Parameters (may be null)
        aParticlePairDistanceParameters - ParticlePairDistanceParameters instance ((may be null)

        calculateParticlePairInteraction in class ParticlePairInteractionCalculator
        Parameters:
        aParticleIndex_i - Index of particle i

        aRij_z - z[aParticleIndex_i] - z[aParticleIndex_j]
        aRij_Square - Squared distance between particle i and j
        aRij - Distance between particle i and j
